coreAttributes.name: Shrimp Cocktail
coreAttributes.description: A disposable cocktail glass rimmed with freshly poached shrimp and with a small cup of spicy sauce in the centre. The illustration on the outer packaging shows an octopus-morph in chef's clothing handling a comically large number of ingredients and utensils at once.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the clear plastic cover and [npc.verb(grab)] the cocktail glass. Unable to resist the delicious-looking little shellfish inside, [npc.she] eagerly [npc.verb(start)] dipping and snacking and in a matter of moments [npc.has] completely devoured the entire arrangement.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the clear plastic cover and [npc.verb(hold)] out the cocktail glass to [npc2.name]. Unable to resist the delicious-looking little shellfish inside, [npc2.she] eagerly [npc2.verb(start)] dipping and snacking and in a matter of moments [npc2.has] completely devoured the entire arrangement.
